DOC.brief_summary: Investigate safety/tolerability after a single dose intranasal administration of DSP-3025 comparator placebo to healthy male volunteers and seasonal allergic rhinitis male patients out of season.
DOC.brief_title: DSP-3025 Study of Healthy Male Volunteers and Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis Male Patients Out of Season
DOC.criteria: Body mass index (BMI) between 18.5 and 25 kg/ m2 and a weight between 50 and 80 kg No clinically relevant abnormal findings History of cedar and/or Japanese cypress pollen induced seasonal allergic rhinitis for at least the previous 2 years (only Allergic rhinitis) Acute illness which requires medical intervention Definite or suspected personal history of adverse drug reactions or drug hypersensitivity Clinical relevant disease or disorder (past or present) A history of asthma
